content: I finally had to admit to myself that I am not the kind of person that gets to the gym. Bit the bullet and invested in an elliptical and some weights and kettlebells (I think everything was $650 or so, all new? this was five years ago, so I’m already at around a $150/year price. This was after trying to find something decent on craiglist for less for a couple months which just never panned out.) and so worth it in the long run, zero regrets. Granted this involved two very large privileges — an apartment with space for a small elliptical and the ability to make an investment up front that not everyone can do, but damn if I don’t actually work out if all I have to do is roll out of bed, throw on work out clothes and take a few steps to my “gym.”
